reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Velocity Clone V1.Single Coil SS 26g. .4Î©. 30 Watts. Cotton Wick         
**% Used:** 12.5    
**Flavor Description:** Berry Sweet Tarts Candy    
**Off-Flavors:**  None    
**Pairings:**  Candy, Some fruits maybe.        
**Position In The Recipe:** Upfront. It's got a beginning, middle and end though.     
**Throat hit:**  3.5/5    
**Relatable Flavors:** Bottle caps candy. Razzles. The candy that turns into a gum.     
**Uses:** Candy mixes. It's really not bad stand alone. It's not something I'd want to drop into a natural fruit flavor mix though.     
**Notes:** Neat flavor. A novelty.It's a stand alone candy flavor that has a few things going on all at once. Nothing wrong with it at all. For what it is.     
**Rating:** 4/5
reviewsJson.author: TexasHex
reviewsJson.title: Razzleberry
